Title: Nominal Ops Envelope
Text: The aircraft ground and turnaround operations at Cat C/D airports shall conform to the nominal operations envelope defined in ATA 02 operational documents.
AcceptanceCriteria: AC-02-001 Nominal ops checks pass for Cat C/D airports in the defined ODD

Title: Hot/High Derating
Text: Turnaround procedures shall mandate thrust derating and additional operational checks for operations at ambient temperature ≥ ISA+20 and aerodrome elevation > 6000 ft.
AcceptanceCriteria: AC-02-015 All hot/high turnaround scenarios meet performance margins for runway length and brake energy

Title: Cold-Soak De-icing
Text: Turnaround operations shall include mandatory de-icing inspection and, where required, de-icing procedures for cold-soaked conditions with effective skin temperature ≤ ISA−30.
AcceptanceCriteria: AC-02-021 De-icing checklist executed without anomalies; measured residual ice below defined safety threshold
